title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, changes are immediately made without warning.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Notice that the package view is filtered.
EB: 1. Remove the working set. 2. Observe that the package view is no longer filtered.
SR: Provide a confirmation message or warning when removing a working set to inform the user that changes will be made to the package view.
